text: 19|58|Era'i tara, nabidera madhye allah yaderake anugraha karechena, adamera bansa theke ebam yaderake amara nuhera sathe naukaya arohana kariyechilama. Ara ibarahima o isara'ilera bansodbhuta, ara yaderake amara hedayata diyechilama ebam manonita karechilama; tadera kache dayamayera ayata tila'oyata kara hale tara lutiye parata sajadaya [1] ebam kannaya [2].
